on reading compounds: 責任【セキニン】duty, responsibility (incl. supervision of staff), liability, onus
問責【モンセキ】blame, censure, reproof, reprimand, rebuke
kun reading compounds: 責める【せめる】to condemn, to blame, to criticize, to criticise, to reproach, to accuse, to urge, to press, to pester, to torture, to torment, to persecute, to break in (a horse)
